["Start Timestamp","End Timestamp","Transcript"]
["00:00,000","00:09,540","\"It all started 53 years ago, back when I was a fully grown little boy.\""]
["00:09,540","00:15,140","\"One day, while I was jumping through the street, I happened upon a large vehicle, which clobbered\""]
["00:15,140","00:18,700","\"me violently into a nearby window.\""]
["00:18,700","00:23,460","\"After getting my bearings, I looked up to see a young boy with a Game Boy Advanced SP\""]
["00:23,460","00:26,580","\"Blue Edition in his tiny little hands.\""]
["00:26,580","00:31,700","\"I had always dreamed of owning a Game Boy Advance Despis Blue Edition, but my family\""]
["00:31,700","00:34,500","\"could barely even afford gold.\""]
["00:34,500","00:40,300","\"He looked up at me with those big vibrating eyes, his two lower teeth quivered in confusion.\""]
["00:45,340","00:51,620","\"I ran at him screaming and stomping my feet, scrambling his brain and sheer confusion.\""]
["00:51,620","00:56,260","\"I shoved him as hard as I could and grabbed his Game Boy Advance Despis Blue Edition, and\""]
["00:58,140","01:00,900","\"I leaped back down the street towards my home.\""]
["01:00,900","01:06,420","\"I pulled open the door by its big smelly handle and I let myself in quietly.\""]
["01:06,420","01:10,300","\"I snuck past my many parents and shut myself into my room.\""]
["01:12,220","01:16,820","\"Finally, the Game Boy advanced S.P. to call my own.\""]
["01:16,820","01:19,460","\"I will have to keep it hidden from my family.\""]
["01:19,460","01:23,260","\"I shunt ever allow them to know.\""]
["01:23,260","01:29,220","\"I took the Game Boy SP in my small beautiful hands and proceeded to slide the switch to\""]
["01:30,380","01:35,300","\"I will never forget that wonderful sound it made the first time I turned it on.\""]
["01:35,300","01:39,540","\"And that wonderful Nintendo logo splashed my screen and sheared a light.\""]
["01:39,540","01:43,580","\"I blew out my candle and I pulled my curtain shut tight.\""]
["01:43,580","01:48,260","\"I wanted absolutely nothing to get in the way of my first Game Boy advanced as a Blue\""]
["01:50,700","01:55,000","\"Suddenly, a small man appeared on screen.\""]
["01:55,000","02:00,240","\"Shortly after, the word Mario started flashing behind him.\""]
["02:00,240","02:04,040","\"I assumed this man is the man known as Mario.\""]
["02:04,040","02:06,880","\"I had seen Adverts showing him on television.\""]
["02:06,880","02:11,640","\"The title of the game slowly lowered itself in from the top of the screen.\""]
["02:13,480","02:19,440","\"And the legend of the stolen Game Boy Advance Test peep blew edition.\""]
["02:19,440","02:25,500","\"My heart sank, as I noticed a dead pixel in the lower left region of the screen.\""]
["02:25,500","02:30,440","\"Beggars can't be choosers, I thought to myself, however, and I pressed the start button with\""]
["02:32,240","02:38,200","\"A vast landscape with clouds, bushes, and bricks appeared before my very eye.\""]
["02:38,200","02:43,600","\"And there he was, the familiar Mario man I had grown to enjoy.\""]
["02:43,600","02:46,440","\"I pushed left on the left button.\""]
["02:46,440","02:53,200","\"Mario himself dashed to the left, dust between his silly brown shoes filled the air.\""]
["02:53,200","02:58,880","\"Amazed by his speed, I quickly pushed right to test his turning abilities.\""]
["02:58,880","03:04,560","\"I was not disappointed, as Mario changed direction in a matter of seconds.\""]
["03:04,560","03:07,680","\"I learned the other button functions as I played.\""]
["03:07,680","03:11,760","\"Be allowed, Mario, to dash in high speed similar to my own.\""]
["03:11,760","03:17,140","\"he allowed him to leap so high in the sky that I screamed in fear that perhaps maybe\""]
["03:19,300","03:23,760","\"Yet he always did, which engaged me in the game world even further.\""]
["03:23,760","03:29,700","\"I quickly grasped the concepts of jumping large gaps, avoiding enemies, and climbing\""]
["03:29,700","03:33,380","\"a big big flagpole at the end of each level.\""]
["03:33,380","03:36,740","\"I got to the fourth level without much problems.\""]
["03:36,740","03:41,020","\"I looked into a nearby mirror and smiled at myself with one eyebrow raised and I said\""]
["03:41,020","03:46,780","\"loudly does this game think I am not good I can handle anything it throws my way\""]
["03:46,780","03:56,700","\"oh suddenly the screen turned black and I don't just mean black I mean so black\""]
["03:56,700","04:04,300","\"the screen looked like a big deep deep hole I said out loud is this a hole I see\""]
["04:04,300","04:11,660","\"before me, and it echoed like a hole. I wiped a large chunk of sweat from my flopping brow.\""]
["04:11,660","04:19,180","\"That was weird I thought in a big bubble next to my head. The level loaded, but this time it\""]
["04:19,180","04:26,460","\"took a lot longer. Mario stood in place, so I pushed right and he began running. I noticed the\""]
["04:26,460","04:33,460","\"The graphics were getting all jumbly. Also, the music was becoming less \"\"dah-da-da-da-da-da-da.\"\"\""]
["04:33,460","04:46,220","\"And more \"\"B-B-B-B-B-B!\"\" I was nearing the first gap of the stage to jump over. As I drew closer, I read my sweating pink thumb over the A button.\""]
["04:46,220","04:51,220","\"The gap was here. I pushed the button, but Mario didn't jump.\""]
["04:51,220","04:59,900","\"He just screamed. I pushed left as fast as I could and he ground to a halt right at the edge of the gap.\""]
["04:59,900","05:07,180","\"I pushed A frantically and repeatedly to try and make him jump, but he just screamed and screamed.\""]
["05:07,180","05:14,700","\"The camera zoomed in on my face as I pummeled that A button, trying to make Mario fill that air above his body.\""]
["05:15,220","05:19,800","\"But all that filled the air were my friend Mario screams of fear.\""]
["05:22,200","05:27,280","\"I pulled the cartridge from the Game Boy Advance recipe and I threw it out of my window.\""]
["05:27,280","05:33,000","\"It landed in some mud outside and I laughed and I closed my window.\""]
["05:33,000","05:39,000","\"I turned around and I saw that the cart was back in my game boy.\""]
["05:39,000","05:41,840","\"Mud oozed from its cart slot.\""]
["05:41,840","05:44,440","\"I gasped and I said to myself,\""]
["05:48,040","05:51,020","\"The Game Boy turned itself back on.\""]
["05:51,020","05:56,760","\"Mario's face appeared with hyper-realistic skin pores and bloody chapped lips.\""]
["06:02,840","06:11,520","\"Now I, Mario, of Nintendo, of America, incorporated, cursed you forever.\"\"\""]
["06:11,520","06:14,880","\"I screamed aloud, louder than an eagle of the night.\""]
["06:14,880","06:18,120","\"There must be some way to undo this curse.\""]
["06:18,120","06:22,720","\"I decided the only way to rid myself of this curse was to beat the game.\""]
["06:22,720","06:24,720","\"I ran up to the first gap of the level.\""]
["06:24,720","06:28,120","\"I pushed A and Mario just screamed again.\""]
["06:28,120","06:31,520","\"I fell into the hole and Mario lost a life.\""]
["06:31,520","06:36,280","\"This is when I noticed my skin began to rot and turned slightly green.\""]
["06:36,280","06:38,480","\"What on earth is happening Mario?\""]
["06:44,640","06:47,680","\"I asked, \"\"How can I beat the game with only screams?\"\"\""]
["06:47,680","06:49,920","\"I cannot jump gaps by screaming.\""]
["06:55,080","06:57,240","\"I decided not to beat the game.\""]
["06:59,240","07:02,320","\"I decided that I was going to do the right thing.\""]
["07:02,320","07:07,120","\"I ran out of my room, pushing my feeble mother out of my way in the hallway.\""]
["07:07,120","07:09,920","\"I ran down the street towards the boy's house.\""]
["07:09,920","07:14,000","\"Thunder bellowed and rain-pitter-pattered on my crying face.\""]
["07:14,000","07:17,120","\"Finally, I reached the house.\""]
["07:17,120","07:20,600","\"I leaped up to the boy's window and let myself in.\""]
["07:27,840","07:30,120","\"I turned on the light switch.\""]
["07:30,120","07:34,640","\"As the room lit up, I saw many people dressed in black.\""]
["07:39,320","07:43,240","\"I asked with tears running down my chinny chin chin.\""]
["07:43,240","07:46,800","\"We are this boy's family, a woman replied.\""]
["07:49,120","07:54,120","\"She pointed into the center of the room, where a small white coffin was suspended over a\""]
["07:56,880","07:59,160","\"Is your boy inside that box?\""]
["07:59,160","08:02,840","\"I asked with an eyebrow raised in a finger on my chin.\""]
["08:03,840","08:09,720","\"A crazed person broke into our home, ravaged our son and stole his childhood by killing\""]
["08:13,800","08:17,480","\"I held the Game Boy tightly in my clenched fist.\""]
["08:21,640","08:25,560","\"His mother walked over to me with a big fat tear in her eye.\""]
["08:26,560","08:31,360","\"It really means a lot that a stranger would let himself into our home to pay respects\""]
["08:33,360","08:38,640","\"\"\"I'm sure you two would have gotten along great,\"\" she then pointed to the priest and said.\""]
["08:38,640","08:44,320","\"\"\"Please lower our child to do the earth now,\"\" the priest did just that.\""]
["08:44,320","08:48,280","\"He pulled on a lever with a shiny red ball on it.\""]
["08:48,280","08:50,400","\"The coffin started going down.\""]
["08:50,400","08:54,160","\"I shoved the mother from me and I sprinted towards the coffin.\""]
["08:54,160","08:57,880","\"I jumped on that coffin and the rope snapped.\""]
["08:57,880","09:01,240","\"I began falling into the earth with the child inside.\""]
["09:01,240","09:05,040","\"I heard the screams from his family echoing above.\""]
["09:05,040","09:11,240","\"I pried open the coffin as we fell, and I shoved the Game Boy into his tiny, cold mouth.\""]
["09:13,560","09:16,520","\"I screamed at the top of my head.\""]
["09:16,520","09:20,800","\"I noticed that we weren't hitting the bottom, and that the darkness in this hole reminded\""]
["09:20,800","09:23,800","\"me of the dark I saw in the Game Boy.\""]
["09:23,800","09:26,200","\"Could this be what I saw before?\""]
["09:26,200","09:31,480","\"From the darkness, a floating black and white head of Mario appeared.\""]
["09:31,480","09:39,160","\"He said to me, \"\"In this hall you shall bore with the dead body of a child.\"\"\""]
["09:39,160","09:41,880","\"And then he gossian blurred away.\""]
["09:41,880","09:46,640","\"This is what I get for stealing, I guess, I said as I shrugged.\""]
["09:46,640","09:50,360","\"Suddenly, Mario appeared again.\""]
["09:50,360","09:55,400","\"He said, \"\"Wow, it sounds like you learned your lesson.\""]
["09:59,240","10:03,940","\"He clicked his mustache, and I was back in my room.\""]
["10:03,940","10:06,240","\"I looked over on my bed, and the Game Boy advanced\""]
["10:06,240","10:08,740","\"as the speed blue edition was gone.\""]
["10:08,740","10:11,380","\"My mother opened the door, and she said,\""]
["10:11,380","10:16,380","\"\"\"My son, my beautiful son, I make you eggzontost.\"\"\""]
["10:16,380","10:20,500","\"And she threw it on my bed and left\""]
["10:24,160","10:29,080","\"I realized, maybe stealing not okay.\""]
["10:29,080","10:31,120","\"I looked to the sky and I said,\""]
["10:31,120","10:34,920","\"thank you, Mario inside Game Boy.\""]
["10:34,920","10:37,520","\"Everything would be all right.\""]
["10:37,520","10:40,680","\"And though the child remained permanently dead,\""]
["10:40,680","10:44,480","\"his mother could always play his Game Boy Advance\""]
["10:44,480","10:48,640","\"to speed Blue Edition to remember him by.\""]
